creator: jian.cai@sun.com
remm@apache.org
text:
Is this still failing ?
As I undestand the report, it wouldn't happen on Win2k, right ?
I can't see how Tomcat could be causing the test to work on 2k and not on XP;
wouldn't it rather be an issue with the JDK or Windows ?

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Since it is failing on XP and not in 2K, I think it's either a JDK or a platform
problem.
